name: Slow Cooker Chicken and Noodles
author: KathyLP
summary: This is a wonderfully easy soup to cook while at work or on a busy day! This can be 'soupy' with more broth; or sometimes I like to thicken the juice with a little water and cornstarch mixture and let cook till thick.  Then it is good served over mashed potatoes!  Enjoy!!
directions: Place chicken, water, onion and salt and pepper to taste into a slow cooker
Set temperature to low and cook for 6 to 8 hours
When chicken is tender, remove from the slow cooker and tear or chop into bite-sized pieces
Set aside in a small casserole dish to keep warm
Turn the slow cooker up to high heat and stir in the frozen egg noodles
Cook until noodles are tender then return the chicken pieces to the broth
